verses.roman:
jara-jara haila prabhu bhāvera prahāre
bhūmite paḍila, śvāsa nāhika śarīre

synonyms: jara-jara—tottering; haila—there was; prabhu—the Lord; bhāvera—of the ecstatic moods; prahāre—in the onslaught; bhūmite—on the ground; paḍila—fell; śvāsa—breathing; nāhika—there was not; śarīre—in the body.
translation: The entire body of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu began to totter due to the onslaught of various ecstatic symptoms. As a result, He immediately fell on the ground, and His breathing almost stopped.
